skin.title: XE Guestbook Official Skin
XE Guestbook Official Skin
XE Guestbook Official Skin
skin.description: Guestbook页面的设计，在XEskin的设计的基础上，采用蓝色点缀，模块清晰，易于用户查找所需要的信息。 NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
The skin inherits XEskin style, appending with a little bit blue color, make the user easy to read the guestbook information. NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
